c_lift_a_server.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import rospy
00004 from math import pow
00005 from math import exp
00006 from math import sin
00007 from math import cos
00008 from math import copysign
00009 from last_letter.srv import *
00010 
00011 
00012 def calc_lift(req):
00013         alpha = req.alpha
00014         #Import required parameters
00015         M = rospy.get_param('airframe/mcoeff')
00016         alpha0 = rospy.get_param('airframe/alpha_stall')
00017         c_lift_0 = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_lift_0')
00018         c_lift_a = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_lift_a')
00019 
00020         
00021         sigmoid = ( 1+exp(-M*(alpha-alpha0))+exp(M*(alpha+alpha0)) ) / (1+exp(-M*(alpha-alpha0))) / (1+exp(M*(alpha+alpha0)))
00022         linear = (1-sigmoid)*(c_lift_0 + c_lift_a*alpha) #Lift at small AoA
00023         flatPlate = sigmoid*(2*copysign(1,alpha)*pow(sin(alpha),2)*cos(alpha)) #Lift beyond stall
00024         response = linear+flatPlate
00025         return response
00026 
00027 if __name__=='__main__':
00028         rospy.init_node('c_lift_a_server')
00029         s = rospy.Service('c_lift_a', c_lift_a, calc_lift)
00030         rospy.loginfo('c_lift_a service running')
00031         rospy.spin()
